column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I typically get the Tonkotsu spicy with a poached egg and bamboo shoots
column2: and it never lets me down. I wish the bamboo they used was more tender
column3: but I love to add it nonetheless. The noodle texture is really great
column4: just thick enough with some flexibility to it. Besides noodles
column5: the thing that makes or breaks ramen is the broth
column6: and I think they do a good job with it here.
